name: SIPHON Networks
tag_list: sip, voip, unified-communications, systems-integrator, hosted-ip-pbx, sbc, fmc, sip-trunking, service-assurance, hosted-call-recording, professional-services
overview:
SIPHON Networks has a Best-In-Breed portfolio of advanced SIP solutions/applications for Internet Telephony Service Providers.

SIPHON Networks is a leading player in the design, supply, delivery & integration of advanced unified communications technology to enable ITSPs to deliver innovative services on a robust and scalable platform.

The real value of SIPHON Networks is know-how and understanding regarding the key functional components, and importantly requirements, for successful delivery of advanced IP applications.

The value is on integration - a range of complementary technologies, vendors and products which provide a defined function, or functions, within Next Generation Network (NGN) and Unified Communications (UC) infrastructures.

Hosted by an Internet Telephony Service Provider (ITSP), successful integration of these elements enables delivery of advanced, revenue generating services to both Enterprise and Consumer customer market segments which leverage Web, Voice, Video, Presence, Messaging components and capabilities.

SIPHON Networks is based in the UK plus has affiliations with other partners across Europe .
